TopicTitle: SAS causes stable aircraft to twitch perodically

Articles.Content:
As per the title, I think this has been around for a while.

If you build a stable aircraft but then turn on SAS (for example, to maintain level flight) the plane will twitch with a very regular period. The effect does not always seem to occur at 1x warp but will always occur with physics warp turned on.

This never *really* bugged me enough to report it before, but with 0.9 creating contracts to, say, land two continents away to take several ground samples, being able to leave a plane to make its way there on warp would be nice.

Video demonstration: http://youtu.be/mu2sbamgjmg

A mod that may help is the Pilot assistance mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100073-0-25-Pilot-Assistant-0-7-Nov-20-Atmospheric-piloting-aids

I had this wobbly issue as well. Hope it helps ^^
Now that's a very neat mod indeed.

Additional info: It twitches when the sound loops. The sound also loops when not in physics warp, but the brief stutter doesn't have as much effect simply because the game is running at a slower pace.

So I guess this is another "sound loop/stutter" related issue. These have indeed been around since... er... since I started playing I think!
